name: ludum factorum
description:
Have you ever wondered what it’s like to participate in a Ludum Dare compo and create a game in under 48 hours? We all have. That’s why we created ludum factorum, a Ludum Dare compo simulator.

Features:

  • Feel the pressure of the impending deadline
  • Do everything yourself (coding, audio and graphics)
  • Work hard all weekend to create something beautiful barely playable
  • Receive completely fair ratings

Created By:

  • Alexander Mastryukov (Lead Developer)
  • Gnahzanit (Lead 2D Artist)
  • Mahad Gul (Sound Artist | Developer)
  • Mohpreet Mankoo (Developer | 2D Artist)
  • John Marman (Developer)
